page.title: 12Religion In Bishop Monkton
page.content: There are two Churches,a Church of England,and a Methodist. St.John's Church of England is about 100 years old,and the present priest in charge is the Rev. Michael Heckingbottom,who also looks after the neighbouring Parish of Burton Leonard; he has the assistance of a lay reader. The Methodist Church was built in 1874 The present Minister is the Rev.B.Marshall,who looks after a large city Church in Ripon as well as six village chapels in the Ripon-Masham circuit.There are six retired Ministers in the circuit who visit to preach regularly. United Services are held quarterly at each church. The Parish burial ground at St.John's Church is for the use of the whole village.
